Ukraine's Zelenskiy urges Western unity to stop RussiaUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy urged the West on Tuesday to show a united front against Russian President Vladimir Putin and to step up its support for Kyiv to ensure that Moscow did not prevail in the war. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 14:43:25 GMT DGQLOXTW3BKBVEXBKPTQLK2GAI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-urges-western-unity-stop-Russia-2024-01-16/Reuters商业达沃斯
Hungary's Orban: help for Ukraine should not hurt EU's budgetHelp for Ukraine as it fights Russia's invasion should not damage the European Union's budget, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 14:26:25 GMT LZ5SWSKRHVMUDGKB2P4WT24RNA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungarys-orban-help-ukraine-should-not-hurt-eus-budget-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin gathers re-election signatures in Russian-held UkraineResidents of the Russian-held city of Donetsk in eastern Ukraine lined up on Tuesday to register their support for Vladimir Putin in a presidential vote where he is sure to win re-election. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 14:25:15 GMT IVTPDERUVZLKHI2GBTW4ZFLM74 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-gathers-re-election-signatures- Russian-held-ukraine-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Top French court annuls extradition of Italian mafia killerFrance's top court on Tuesday annulled a lower court decision to extradite Edgardo Greco, a convicted mafia killer-turned-pizza chef who has been on the run since 2006, to Italy. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:59:37 GMT TFIBRLPFUJNMBCXXXTOBH37MLI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/top-french-court-annuls-extradition-italian-mafia-killer-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Saudis could recognise Israel if Palestinian issue resolved - foreign ministerSuch a deal would require a comprehensive agreement that included Palestinian statehood. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:57:31 GMT NTNBNL5JGNK47DVU42P6OQ7QI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudis-could-recognise-israel-if-palestinian-issue-resolved-foreign-minister-2024-01-16/Reuters商业达沃斯
Red Sea crisis forces Michelin to halt output in Spain next weekendFour factories in Spain owned by French tyre maker Michelin are planning to halt output again on the weekend of Jan. 20-21 due to delays in the delivery of raw materials caused by the crisis in the Red Sea, the company's Spanish subsidiary said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:46:05 GMT RKBCDY33HVPIVN6WXVPDIYDU5M https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/red-sea-crisis-forces-michelin-halt-output-spain-next-weekend-2024-01-16/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Sri Lanka's Colombo port sees jump in traffic amid Red Sea tensionsSri Lanka's Colombo port has seen a big jump in container volumes in recent weeks as vessels steering clear of tensions in the southern Red Sea have found it a convenient transit point, officials said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:44:31 GMT 3ZGGSO3XZZJOPPKDOWL2JHQODU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sri-lankas-colombo-port-sees-jump-traffic-amid-red-sea-tensions-2024-01-16/Uditha Jayasinghe世界亚太地区
How to charge a phone in Gaza: patience required, sunshine helpsHuddling around a bewildering tangle of cables and extension leads plugged into a hospital power outlet, displaced Gazan men are pursuing a critical but elusive goal: getting their phones charged. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:36:05 GMT YF4UFNH7WNMUPJ6WFBQ3JGOR2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/how-charge-phone-gaza-patience-required-sunshine-helps-2024-01-16/Saleh Salem, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
Lafarge can be charged with 'complicity in crimes against humanity' over Syria plant, French court saysFrance's highest court on Tuesday rejected a request by French cement maker Lafarge to dismiss charges of complicity in crimes against humanity as part of an investigation over how it kept its factory running in Syria after war broke out in 2011. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 13:29:28 GMT JJYSVGPRNVJ5ZNL6TQ2HGNI6RY https://www.reuters.com/business/lafarge-can-be-charged-with-complicity-crimes-against- humanity-over-syria-plant-2024-01-16/Tassilo Hummel商业
Empty Malta-flagged bulk carrier hit by missile off YemenAn empty Malta-flagged bulk carrier was hit by a missile while heading north through the Red Sea, 76 nautical miles northwest of the Yemeni port of Saleef, a security firm and two Greek shipping ministry sources said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:45:15 GMT UCLXHCLDGNLXTJNYGSHRTO6LZY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ambrey-says-malta-flaagged-bulker-impacted-by-missile-northwest-yemens-saleef-2024-01-16/Reuters世界中东
Iran strike triggers dispute with Iraq as fears of regional turmoil growAn Iranian missile strike on targets in northern Iraq set off an unusual dispute between the neighbouring allies on Tuesday, with Baghdad recalling its ambassador in protest and Tehran insisting the attack was intended to deter threats from Israeli spies. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:44:07 GMT K5YIXATAXBLJTIDVGP4VQJWMMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-strike-triggers-row-with-iraq-fears-regional-turmoil-grow-2024-01-16/Parisa Hafezi, Timour Azhari世界中东
